summary.span: 表示 ASP.NET 应用程序中数据绑定控件的实体数据模型 (EDM)。

span.span: Represents an Entity Data Model (EDM) to data-bound controls in an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 可以使用以及从 EDM 检索数据以显示、 编辑和按使用很少或没有代码在网页上的数据进行排序的数据绑定控件的控件。You can use the control together with a data-bound control to retrieve data from an EDM and to display, edit, and sort data on a Web page by using little or no code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[EntityDataSource Web 服务器控件概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f09af00-9578-4744-a029-765710a3c83f)。For more information, see [EntityDataSource Web Server Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f09af00-9578-4744-a029-765710a3c83f). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当的属性控件设置为`true`，该控件自动生成 ORDER BY 子句中的参数从分配给属性。When the property of the control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates an ORDER BY clause from the parameter in the assigned to the property. 这消除了需要显式分配到 ORDER BY 子句属性。This eliminates the need to explicitly assign an ORDER BY clause to the property. 如果您设置属性设置为`true`，则应显式将值赋给属性。If you set the property to `true`, you should not explicitly assign a value to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例自动生成 ORDER BY 子句，并使用的值`OrderByDropDownList`设置参数的值。The following example automatically generates the ORDER BY clause and uses the value of the `OrderByDropDownList` to set the value of the parameter. ``` ``` 下面的示例自动生成 ORDER BY 子句，并使用`DefaultValue`属性的`Parameter`元素中设置参数的值。The following example automatically generates the ORDER BY clause and uses the `DefaultValue` attribute of the `Parameter` element to set the value of the parameter. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使实体类型属性的表达式筛选查询结果，可以使用属性。To filter query results by equating an entity type property to an expression, you can use the property. 当的属性控件设置为`true`，该控件自动生成`WHERE`子句中的参数的属性。When the property of the control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates a `WHERE` clause from the parameters in the of the property. 属性的每个参数必须与在查询结果中包含的实体类型属性名相匹配。The property of each parameter has to match an entity type property name that is included in the query results. 如果您设置属性设置为`true`，不应显式分配`WHERE`子句属性。If you set the property to `true`, you should not explicitly assign a `WHERE` clause to the property. ## 示例Example 在下面的示例属性设置为`true`。In the following example the property is set to `true`. 因此，的属性必须匹配在查询结果中包含的实体类型属性名。Therefore, the of the property has to match an entity type property name that is included in the query results. 该查询用于选择 SalesOrderID 和 TotalDue SalesOrderHeader 实体类型的属性。The query selects the SalesOrderID and TotalDue properties of the SalesOrderHeader entity type. 自动生成`WHERE`子句将筛选查询结果选择 TotalDueList 列表框控件中的值将 TotalDue 值进行对比。The automatically generated `WHERE` clause will filter the query results by comparing the TotalDue value to a value selected in the TotalDueList list box control. ``` ``` ## 示例Example 默认情况下， 属性设置为 `false`。By default, the property is set to `false`. 这意味着我们需要提供`WHERE`子句。This means that we have to supply the `WHERE` clause. 在以下示例中，`WHERE`子句是`Where="it.TotalDue < @totalDueParam"`totalDueParam 是参数名称。In the following example, the `WHERE` clause is `Where="it.TotalDue < @totalDueParam"` and totalDueParam is the parameter name. ``` ```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件是否支持在运行时在数据的各部分之间导航。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control supports navigation through sections of the data at run time.

value.span: 如果用户可以对数据进行分页，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user can page through the data; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持自动分页查询返回的数据。The control supports automatically paging through the data returned by queries. 属性是一个布尔属性，指示是否绑定到数据控件的查询所返回的数据启用分页。The property is a Boolean property that indicates whether paging is enabled for data that is returned by queries bound to data controls. 当此属性设置为`true`，则控件添加到相应的查询生成器方法根据信息提供给由数据绑定控件。When this property is set to `true`, the control adds the appropriate query builder methods to the based on the information supplied to the by the data-bound control. 值属性确定是否的属性支持的数据源的控件是`true`或`false`。The value of the property determines whether the property of the control that supports the data source is `true` or `false`. 在投影定义与已启用分页时，必须定义对结果进行排序所依据的属性。When you define a projection with paging enabled, you must define the property by which to order the results. 这意味着，当您设置属性来定义投影，并且具有设置为`true`，则还必须设置属性来定义的顺序或设置属性设置为`true`并添加订单通过参数集合。This means that when you set the property to define a projection and have set to `true`, you must also set the property to define the order or set the property to `true` and add an ORDER BY parameter to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持自动对查询返回的数据进行排序。The control supports automatically sorting the data returned by queries. 属性的控件是一个布尔属性，指示是否绑定到数据控件的查询所返回的数据启用排序。The property of the control is a Boolean property that indicates whether sorting is enabled for data that is returned by queries that are bound to data controls. 当此属性设置为`true`，则控件添加到相应的查询生成器方法根据信息提供给由数据绑定控件。When this property is set to `true`, the control adds the appropriate query builder methods to the based on the information supplied to the by the data-bound control. 值属性确定是否并的属性支持的数据源的控件是`true`或`false`。The value of the property determines whether the and properties of the control that supports the data source is `true` or `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的控件可用于指定使用自定义的实体 SQL 表达式的查询。The property of the control enables you to specify a query that uses a custom Entity SQL expression. 如 SELECT 语句中，创建的不是可更新的原始数据投影。Like the SELECT statement, creates a projection of the original data that is not updatable. 当属性分配、 更新、 插入和删除功能已禁用。When the property is assigned, update, insert, and delete functionalities are disabled. 在此情况下，方法， ，并的相关控件都返回`false`。In this case, the methods , , and of the related control all return `false`. 当属性设置，则将引发异常方法调用被数据绑定到的控件控制如果的值， ，或设置为`true`。When the property is set, an exception is thrown when the method is called by a control that is data bound to an control if the value of , , or is set to `true`. 如果设置为返回的属性投影的查询 (例如，"`SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`")、 一个将返回。If the is set to a query that returns a projection of properties (for example, "`SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`"), a will be returned. ## Examples 下面的示例使用到提供的 Entity SQL 命令返回的产品对象的集合。The following example uses the supplied Entity SQL command to returns a collection of Product objects. ``` ``` 以下示例返回一系列预测的列：The following example returns a projected series of columns: ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的可以从应用程序配置文件的元素中存储的已命名 EDM 连接字符串初始化控件。The property of the control can be initialized from a named EDM connection string stored in the element of the application configuration file. 通过使用实体数据模型向导创建 EDM 后，应用程序配置文件中创建的命名的 EDM 连接。When the EDM is created by using the Entity Data Model Wizard, a named EDM connection is created in the application configuration file. 当应用程序配置文件中找到指定的 EDM 连接字符串时，该连接是显示为 EntityDataSource 设计器的配置数据源向导中的一个选项。When a named EDM connection string is found in the application configuration file, the connection is visible as an option in the Configure Data Source wizard of the EntityDataSource designer. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据源配置向导 （EntityDataSource 控件）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/263976a5-2406-47c0-8919-c6af6e76d78e)。For more information, see [Configure Data Source Wizard (EntityDataSource Control)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/263976a5-2406-47c0-8919-c6af6e76d78e). 如果未指定属性，这两个并属性必须设置为要创建的控件。If the property is not specified, both the and properties must be set for the control to create the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理此事件，以防止由从正在释放的控件。Handle this event to prevent the used by the control from being disposed of. 执行此操作时要使用单个实例中与几个控件或实例的页面控件。Do this when you want to use a single instance in your page with several controls or instances of the control. 若要防止从正在释放，设置的属性对象传递给`true`。To prevent the from being disposed of, set the property of the object to `true`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[对象上下文的生命周期管理 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160)。For more information, see [Object Context Life-Cycle Management (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160). 对象上下文的详细信息，请参阅[标识解析、 状态管理和更改跟踪](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)。For more information about the object context, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0). ## Examples 若要保留现有供将来参考取消的实例成员事件，如下面的代码所示。To keep an existing instance member for future reference cancel the event as shown by the following code. ```csharp protected void EntityDataSource2_ContextDisposing(object sender, EntityDataSourceContextDisposingEventArgs e) { e.Cancel = true; } ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件引发之后方法只是已成功对调用删除的对象。The event is raised after the method has just been successfully called on the to delete an object. 属性的对象用于访问已删除的对象。The property of the object is used to access the deleted object. 此对象处于状态。This object is in a state. 如果删除一个对象，出错引发事件时，的属性对象设置为返回，和属性设置为`null`。If an error occurs when an object is deleted, the event is raised, the property of the object is set to the returned , and the property is set to `null`. 如果处理中的异常事件处理程序，设置属性设置为`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这可以防止从再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 指定的值时`false`有关属性，再次引发该异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于面向 ASP.NET 4 或更早版本的 web 应用程序，属性值存储在视图状态，并自动回发之间保留。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4 or earlier, the property value is stored in view state and is automatically maintained between postbacks. 对于 web 应用程序面向 ASP.NET 4.5，属性值不存储在视图状态，并且你必须将每个 HTTP 请求的值。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4.5, the property value is not stored in view state, and you must set the value for each HTTP request.

summary.span: 获取或设置指定要包含在查询结果中的相关对象的表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets the expression that specifies the related objects to include in the query results.

value.span: 要在查询结果中返回的以逗号分隔的查询路径列表。

span.span: Comma-separated list of query paths to return in the query results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的控件指定查询路径定义与专门查询的对象一起返回对象 thatare 的以逗号分隔列表。The property of the control specifies a comma-separated list of query paths that define the objects thatare returned together with the specifically queried object. 传递的字符串中的每个以逗号分隔值，而无需修改，作为单独调用方法由执行[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。Each comma-separated value in the string is passed, without modification, as a separate call to the method of an that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查询是通过控制数据的源控件。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 属性值作为参数应用于执行前。The property is the argument applied to the before it is executed. 该字符串提供给属性使用相同的格式为字符串传递给方法的。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 有关如何使用查询路径以自动加载相关的对象的示例，请参阅[如何： 设置结果的形状中使用查询路径](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/100bf7f5-00ba-4c17-8e27-7a8a14831093)。For examples of how to use query paths to automatically load related objects, see [How to: Use Query Paths to Shape Results](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/100bf7f5-00ba-4c17-8e27-7a8a14831093). 当属性用于指定查询路径，将相关实体的属性仅可用于只读数据绑定。When the property is used to specify query paths, the properties of the related entities can only be used for read-only data-binding. 如果相关的对象未显式包含在查询路径中，属性说明符仍可用于数据绑定，但属性本身返回 null 值。If related objects are not explicitly included in the query path, the property descriptors are still available for data binding, but the properties themselves return null values. 在这种情况下，必须显式加载相关的对象以显示其值。In this case, the related objects must be explicitly loaded to display their values. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载相关对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1). ## Examples 下面的 XML 标记定义返回的查询路径`SalesOrderHeader`对象相关的返回`Contact`对象。The following XML markup defines a query path that returns `SalesOrderHeader` objects related to the returned `Contact` object. 与每个`SalesOrderHeader`，相关`SalesOrderDetail`和`Address`对象也会返回。With each `SalesOrderHeader`, the related `SalesOrderDetail` and `Address` objects are also returned. ``` ``` 上面的 XML 示例等同于以下名为`customers`:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `customers`: ``` ObjectQuery customers = context.Contact .Where("it.ContactID = @ContactID", new ObjectParameter("ContactID", customerId)) .Include("SalesOrderHeader.SalesOrderDetail") .Include("SalesOrderHeader.Address"); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加的对象在创建数据源中或如果错误发生的对象数据保留到数据源时引发事件。The event is raised when the added object is created in the data source or if an error has occurred when the object data is persisted to the data source. 属性的对象用于访问添加的对象。The property of the object is used to access the added object. 此对象的属性包含从数据源，包括任何数据源生成的值返回的值。The properties of this object contain values that are returned from the data source, including any data source-generated values. 如果对象保留到数据源时出错引发事件和的属性对象设置为返回。If an error occurs when an object is persisted to the data source, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 如果处理中的异常事件处理程序，设置属性设置为`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这可以防止从再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 指定的值时`false`有关属性，再次引发该异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新对象保留到数据源之前引发事件。The event is raised before a new object is persisted to the data source. 事件，可以修改或验证所添加的对象、 添加不同的对象，或取消操作。The event enables you to modify or verify the object being added, add a different object, or cancel the operation. 您可以访问从添加的对象属性的对象。You can access the object to be added from the property of the object. 如果提供不同的对象，用户将负责中设置正确的实体类型属性。If supplying a different object, the user is responsible for setting the correct entity type in the property. 若要停止从所添加的对象，设置的属性对象传递给`true`。To stop the object from being added, set the property of the object to `true`. 如果创建一个新对象时出错引发事件和的属性对象设置为返回。If an error occurs when creating a new object, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 当处理中的异常事件处理程序，设置属性设置为`true`。When you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这可以防止从再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 指定的值时`false`有关属性，再次引发该异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的控件是一个字符串，表示 Entity SQL 查询的表达式。The property of the control is a string that represents an expression of an Entity SQL query. 此字符串无需修改，即传递到由执行[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。This string is passed, without modification, to an that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查询是通过控制数据的源控件。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 该字符串提供给属性使用相同的格式为字符串传递给方法的。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 有关如何使用对查询结果进行排序的子句的示例，请参阅[如何： 对数据进行排序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c05f2506-cb9d-4ebc-822b-300042ad53e7)。For examples of how to use the clause to order query results, see [How to: Sort Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c05f2506-cb9d-4ebc-822b-300042ad53e7). ## Examples 在以下示例中，在.aspx 文件中的 XML 标记从控件中检索一个值，并将其传递的参数作为属性。The XML markup in the following example, in an .aspx file, retrieves a value from a control and passes it as a parameter to the property. ``` ``` 上面的 XML 示例等同于以下名为`onlineOrders`:The previous XML example is equivalent to the following named `onlineOrders`: ``` ObjectQuery onlineOrders = context.SalesOrderHeader .Where("it.OnlineOrderFlag = TRUE AND it.TotalDue > @ordercost", new ObjectParameter("ordercost", orderCost)) .OrderBy("it.TotalDue DESC"); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的控件包含一个字符串，表示的 Entity SQL 查询语句。The property of the control contains a string that represents the statement of an Entity SQL query. 这使您可以项目一组指定的从查询返回的对象的属性。This enables you to project a specified set of properties from the objects returned by the query. 此字符串无需修改，即传递到由执行[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。This string is passed, without modification, to the that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查询是通过控制数据的源控件。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 该字符串提供给属性使用相同的格式为字符串传递给方法的。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 有关如何使用子句定义查询投影的示例，请参阅[如何： 执行查询，返回匿名类型对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3b264025-e911-4d73-90ce-992d2b9d189d)。For examples of how to use the clause to define a projection for a query, see [How to: Execute a Query that Returns Anonymous Type Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3b264025-e911-4d73-90ce-992d2b9d189d). 投影的数据不支持更新。Updates are not supported for projected data. 这意味着，当您使用属性指定的投影，绑定的数据绑定不支持更新。This means that when you use the property to specify a projection, the bound data binding does not support updates. 在投影定义与已启用分页时，必须定义对结果进行排序所依据的属性。When you define a projection with paging enabled, you must define the property by which to order the results. 这意味着，当您设置属性设置为定义投影，并且拥有设置为`true`，还必须设置属性来定义的顺序或设置属性设置为`true`并添加订单通过参数集合。This means the when you set the property to defined a projection and have set to `true`, you must also set the property to define the order or set the property to `true` and add an ORDER BY parameter to the collection. 如果不能设置， ，或已启用。 cannot be set if , , or is enabled. 如果设置为返回的属性投影的查询 (例如， `SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`)、 一个将返回。If the is set to a query that returns a projection of properties (for example, `SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`), a will be returned. ## Examples 下面的 XML 标记使用属性来指定具有六个产品类型的属性的投影：The following XML markup uses the property to specify a projection with six of the properties of the Product type: ``` ``` 上面的 XML 示例等同于以下名为`products`:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `products`: ``` ObjectQuery products = context.Product .Select(it.[ProductID], it.[Name], it.[ListPrice], it.[Size], it.[Style], it.[Weight]) .OrderBy("it.[ProductID]"); ```

span.span: Occurs after a query has been executed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行查询并返回数据后引发事件。The event is raised after a query has been executed and data has been returned. 如果查询准备或执行期间出错，它还会引发。It is also raised if an error occurred during query preparation or execution. 的属性对象包含的从查询返回的对象。The property of the object contains an of objects that are returned from the query. 处理事件检索和存储返回中的实体。Handle the event to retrieve and store returned entities in the . 这样做可以保存对象的页上的更改。Do this to persist object changes on the page. 属性的对象中所有页面，而不考虑分页的数据绑定控件由传递的值显示对象的总数。The property of the object shows the total number of objects in all pages, regardless of the values passed by the data-bound control for paging. 是仅检索如果数据绑定控件需要它，例如，如果启用分页。 is only retrieved if the data-bound control needs it, such as if paging is enabled. 如果准备或执行查询时出错引发事件时，的属性对象设置为返回，并属性设置为`null`。If an error occurs when the query is prepared or executed, the event is raised, the property of the object is set to the returned , and the property is set to `null`. 如果处理中的异常事件处理程序，设置属性设置为`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这可以防止从再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 指定的值时`false`有关属性，再次引发该异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

span.span: Occurs before a query is constructed and executed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造并执行查询之前引发事件。The event is raised before a query is constructed and executed. 处理要修改的配置事件或读取或更改的数据绑定控件中的参数，构建并执行查询之前。Handle the event to modify the configuration of the or read or change the arguments from the data-bound control before the query is constructed and executed. 设置的属性对象传递给`true`取消查询。Set the property of the object to `true` to cancel the query. 取消选择的操作时，无数据返回到的数据绑定控件。When the SELECT operation is canceled, no data is returned to the data-bound control. 如果`AllowPaging`设置为`true`在数据绑定控件中，调用并上查询生成器方法使用的值和的属性对象。If `AllowPaging` is set to `true` in the data-bound control, the invokes the and query builder methods on using the values of the and properties of the object. 如果`AllowSorting`设置为`true`在数据绑定控件中，的对象可以更改当处理事件。If `AllowSorting` is set to `true` in the data-bound control, the of the object can be changed when the event is handled. 任何其他查询运算符，如 WHERE 或 ORDER BY，页面标记中指定的应用后引发事件。Any other query operators, such as WHERE or ORDER BY, that are specified in the page markup are applied after the event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像方法类，可以将参数传递给定义的投影属性。Like the method of the class, parameters can be passed to the projection that is defined by the property. 的属性控制指定，其中包含要提供给查询的 SELECT 语句的参数。The property of the control specifies a that contains the parameters to supply to the SELECT statement of the query. 属性使用命名的参数来提供给在字符串中指定的参数是指属性。The property uses named arguments to refer to the parameters that are specified in the string that is supplied to the property. 如果属性未设置，则不进行任何参数替换。If the property is not set, no parameter substitution is made. 在 SELECT 语句中，为前缀的所有参数名称"`@"`符号`,`必须具有匹配名称。All the parameter names in the SELECT statement, prefixed by the "`@"` symbol`,` must have a matching name in the . 中的参数不允许空值。Null values are not allowed for parameters in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要跟踪更改时更新和删除操作启用了控件必须存储在已加载的对象的原始值的信息。To track changes when update and delete operations are enabled, the control must store information about original values of loaded objects in the . 在视图状态中存储此所需的信息会增加页大小。Storing this required information in the view state will increase the page size. 您可以禁用视图状态中存储原始值，通过设置属性设置为`false`。You can disable storing original values in the view state by setting the property to `false`. 如果执行此操作，[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]无法跟踪已更新的对象中的并发。If you do this, the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] cannot track concurrency in updated objects. 有关详细信息，请参阅[更新数据 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ca153eec-6817-4c1d-b262-efd6d35b0246)。For more information, see [Updating Data (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ca153eec-6817-4c1d-b262-efd6d35b0246).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件实现以提供与 ASP.NET 动态数据的兼容性。The event is implemented to provide for compatibility with ASP.NET Dynamic Data. 此事件，通过定义接口，由显式实现。This event, defined by the interface, is explicitly implemented by the . 不能在标记中注册此事件的处理程序。A handler for this event cannot be registered in markup. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 事件提供了对象，它返回。The event provides an object that returns the . 可能在以下情况下引发事件：The event may be raised in the following cases: - 当创建对象。When an object is created. 这使要验证的属性设置的过程中引发异常的对象上的分部方法。This enables the partial methods on the object to raise exceptions during validation of property settings. - 当查询执行过程中发生异常。When an exception occurs during the execution of the query. - 异常发生时的任何插入在执行期间，更新或删除操作。When an exception occurs during the execution of any INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时对已修改对象的更改保存到数据源，或如果错误发生在应用更改时引发事件。The event is raised when changes to a modified object are persisted to the data source or if an error has occurred when applying changes. 属性的对象用于访问已修改的对象。The property of the object is used to access the modified object. 此对象的属性包含从数据源，包括任何服务器生成的值返回的值。The properties of this object contain values returned from the data source, including any server-generated values. 如果更改永久保存到数据源时出错引发事件和的属性对象设置为返回。If an error occurs when changes are persisted to the data source, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 如果处理中的异常事件处理程序，设置属性设置为`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这可以防止从再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 指定的值时`false`有关属性，再次引发该异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于面向 ASP.NET 4 或更早版本的 web 应用程序，属性值存储在视图状态，并自动回发之间保留。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4 or earlier, the property value is stored in view state and is automatically maintained between postbacks. 对于 web 应用程序面向 ASP.NET 4.5，属性值不存储在视图状态，并且你必须将每个 HTTP 请求的值。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4.5, the property value is not stored in view state, and you must set the value for each HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对对象的属性的更改保留到数据源之前引发事件。The event is raised before changes to the properties of an object are persisted to the data source. 事件，可以修改或验证对对象的更改、 提供不同的对象，或保存所做的更改之前取消该操作。The event enables you to modify or verify changes to the object, supply a different object, or cancel the operation before the changes are persisted. 您可以访问从修改后的对象属性的对象。You can access the modified object from the property of the object. 如果提供不同的对象，用户将负责中设置正确的实体类型属性。If supplying a different object, the user is responsible for setting the correct entity type in the property. 处理事件，如果必须修改有关要设置不同的原始值进行并发控制的对象。Handle the event if you must modify the for the object to set different original values for concurrency control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保存更改和管理并发](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e)。For more information, see [Saving Changes and Managing Concurrency](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e). 若要停止从保留的更改，请设置的属性对象传递给`true`。To stop the changes from being persisted, set the property of the object to `true`. 如果错误发生时实例化对象或修改属性，引发事件和的属性对象设置为返回。If an error occurs when instantiating an object or modifying properties, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 当处理中的异常事件处理程序，设置属性设置为`true`。When you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这可以防止从再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 指定的值时`false`有关属性，再次引发该异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的控件是一个字符串，表示 Entity SQL 查询的谓词的子句。The property of the control is a string that represents a clause that is the predicate of an Entity SQL query. 此字符串无需修改，即传递到由执行[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。This string is passed, without modification, to an that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查询是通过控制数据的源控件。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 该字符串提供给属性使用相同的格式为字符串传递给方法的。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 有关如何使用该子句来筛选查询的示例，请参阅[如何： 筛选数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776f8556-3350-4572-804a-b1513515c1b2)。For examples of how to use the clause to filter a query, see [How to: Filter Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776f8556-3350-4572-804a-b1513515c1b2). 若要使实体类型属性的表达式筛选查询结果，请参阅关于信息属性。To filter query results by equating an entity type property to an expression, see information about the property. ## Examples 在以下示例中，在.aspx 文件中的 XML 标记从控件中检索一个值，并将其传递的参数作为属性。The XML markup in the following example, in an .aspx file, retrieves a value from a control and passes it as a parameter to the property. ``` ``` 上面的 XML 示例等同于以下名为`onlineOrders`:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `onlineOrders`: ``` ObjectQuery onlineOrders = context.SalesOrderHeader .Where("it.OnlineOrderFlag = TRUE AND it.TotalDue > @ordercost", new ObjectParameter("ordercost", orderCost)) .OrderBy("it.TotalDue DESC"); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像方法类，可以将参数传递给分配给该谓词属性。Like the method of the class, parameters can be passed to the predicate assigned to the property. 的属性控制指定，其中包含要提供给查询的 WHERE 子句的参数。The property of the control specifies a that contains the parameters to supply to the WHERE clause of the query. 属性使用命名的参数来提供给在字符串中指定的参数是指属性。The property uses named arguments to refer to the parameters that are specified in the string that is supplied to the property. 如果属性未设置，则不进行任何参数替换。If the property is not set, no parameter substitution is made. WHERE 子句中的所有参数名称前面都带有符号"`@"`必须具有匹配名称。All the parameter names in the WHERE clause preceded by the symbol "`@"` must have a matching name in the . 中的参数不允许空值。Null values are not allowed for parameters in a . ## Examples 在以下示例中，在.aspx 文件中的 XML 标记从控件中检索一个值，并将其传递的参数作为属性。The XML markup in the following example, in an .aspx file, retrieves a value from a control and passes it as a parameter to the property. ``` ``` 上面的 XML 示例等同于以下名为`onlineOrders`:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `onlineOrders`: ``` ObjectQuery onlineOrders = context.SalesOrderHeader .Where("it.OnlineOrderFlag = TRUE AND it.TotalDue > @ordercost", new ObjectParameter("ordercost", orderCost)) .OrderBy("it.TotalDue DESC"); ```
